Here are a few Tidy Up! features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tidy Up! allows you to search for duplicate folders; by name, date modified, date created, label visibility, empty folders, their contents and more.

For a customized strategy, you can opt for Strategy Wizard, which based on your choices creates the appropriate criteria with which to search for duplicates and a new Ã¢â‚¬Å“Smart BasketÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ that will contain the items to be removed, or the manual method, the most customized method offered.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tidy Up! has a security system that assures you will keep at least one file of the duplicate group on your disk, the ability to undo copied and moved items and the ability to restore trashed items as long as the trash is not emptied, even after a restart of the computer.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tidy Up! offers a full-size preview of the most commonly used files such as: audio, media, text, pdf, graphics, fonts and moreÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ and Quick Look like in the Finder (only from OS X 10.5).

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One of the most interesting features of Tidy Up! is the capability to separate, for quick and easy organization, found items using custom criteria via Ã¢â‚¬Å“Smart Baskets.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ It also includes the possibility to choose, from the items belonging to the supported applications, a specific album, playlist or mailbox*.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tidy Up! allows you to trash, move, replace the moved and trashed items with aliases or symbolic links*, burn, assign colored Finder labels and export into html and text files all found items.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tidy Up! is fully customizable and allows you to create your preferred workspace.
